not_enough_frogs: ^Hmm... I see you have not spoken to enough of my kin, traveler.
^You must answer the questions of 10 frogs before you may pass. You are not ready yet.
player_questions: ^Do you have any other questions before you leave?
^Why do I need to answer the frogs?
^Will you at least give me a hint?

c-0: ^Why do I need to answer the frogs?
^Knowledge must be earned. Only those who respect the wisdom of the Num Forest may proceed.
c-1: ^You will be granted passage. And maybe, just maybe, you will learn something valuable.
c-2: ^Will you at least give me a hint?
^Very well. Not all numbers are as simple as they seem. Think carefully before you answer.
c-3: ^No. The path is only for those who prove their wisdom.
